definitions.definition: A portrait ; a likeness ; a painted resemblance; hence, that which is copied from some example or model .
The art of painting or photographing portraits .
A portrait (or portraits considered as a group).

main_definition: A portrait ; a likeness ; a painted resemblance; hence, that which is copied from some example or model .
secondary_definitions: The art of painting or photographing portraits .
A portrait (or portraits considered as a group).
